title: ZAO Citibank to Distribute UralSib Management's Mutual Funds
summary: Moscow – ZAO Citibank and UralSib Management announced today the signing of an agreement that will let Russian clients of ZAO Citibank invest in mutual funds of UralSib Management.
tag-1: ZAO Citibank to Distribute UralSib Management's Mutual Funds
tag-2: Moscow – ZAO Citibank and UralSib Management announced today the signing of an agreement that will let Russian clients of ZAO Citibank invest in mutual funds of UralSib Management.
tag-3: Sergey Korotkov, who heads Russia's Retail Banking business, said: "Citibank is always prudent when choosing its investment partners as we focus on firms with a solid track record, experience and a strong and stable management team. UralSib Management is the oldest participant of the asset management market in Russia. Through this partnership, we continue to extend the range of investment solutions that we offer to our clients."
tag-4: Alexander Pugach, General Director of UralSib Management, said, "Our agreement with Citibank, one of the global banking leaders, will enable us to offer Citibank's Russian clients world-class investment products. These are the first successful steps in our joint project. I hope this partnership will be fruitful and mutually beneficial."
tag-5: UralSib Management offers Citibank's clients four open mutual investment funds: URALSIB FUND First, URALSIB FUND Professional, URALSIB FUND Metals of Russia and URALSIB FUND Oil & Gas.
tag-6: Mutual funds of UralSib Management will be available for Citibank's clients in eight Russian cities: Moscow, St. Petersburg, Volgograd, Yekaterinburg, Nizhny Novgorod, Rostov-on-Don, Samara and Ufa.
tag-7: Citi Citi, a leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
